title: 2nd part of Testing my theory
body:
+That all thread with Red icon will be always at top page of the very first page (if you count "show more"). Because:

+People will unintentionally skipping all non-Red post.(I do) Because:

+This is a fail mimic of Reddit,cuz we don't have "higher power" icon in Reddit, this thing impact a lot to user's mindset.


Please leave a upvote and maybe a comment before your leave this thread, to count individual visit.(very urgent)

I will not link to the 1st thread here to avoid fail data. Track it through my profile if you do care.
*I will need a Red post here to complete this.(done)

replies.body: I'm going to wait for your Hypothesis.
I fell for your trap this time Palpatine.
